text: Manhattan Melodrama is a 1934 crime melodrama movie directed by W. S. Van Dyke and distributed by the Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer company. The film won screenwriter Arthur Caesar an Academy Award for Best Story. ==Cast== *Clark Gable as Blackie Gallagher *William Powell as Jim Wade *Myrna Loy as Eleanor *Mickey Rooney as the Young Blackie Gallagher *Jimmy Butler as the Young Jim Wade Category:1934 drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke
title: Manhattan Melodrama
